## Checklist

- [ ] Follows `RULES.md` and `CONTRIBUTING.md`.
- [ ] No `unwrap` / `expect` / `panic!` in `core`, `crypto`, or `desktop`.
- [ ] Added or updated tests in `tests/` directories where needed.
- [ ] `cargo fmt` and `cargo clippy` pass.
- [ ] For security or privacy changes, reviewed `docs/SECURITY.md`.
